updates

⚇ LCLO x PCO & Conducting! ( August 2025 ) ⚇

I led LCLO in a collaboration with artist Benji Jeffrey as part of PCO’s summer concert, performing his new work BCC! Also I conducted a full orchestra for the first time!


⚇ Midnight Gig in Topolò ( August 2025 ) ⚇

Agnes and I, performed a late night gig in Topolò as part of the Robida Academy of Margins public programme, by the old school, under a bright moon. Photo by Timo Kreuser


⚇ Multi-Band Excitation: A New Piece For Radio ( August 2025 ) ⚇

Agnes and I took part in Robida Collectives Academy of Margins, Radio Gardening Summer School, debuting our new piece, Multi-Band Excitation a workshop and discussion followed by a site-specific installation. A full write up of the piece is available here.
